subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets welcomed an enthusiastic Pedro Martínez to the team’s minicamp to check on his rehabilitation on Wednesday while closing in on a multiyear contract with left-handed reliever Scott Schoeneweis.
snippet: The Mets welcomed an enthusiastic Pedro Martínez to the team’s minicamp to check on his rehabilitation on Wednesday while closing in on a multiyear contract with left-handed reliever Scott Schoeneweis.
